actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to amend section 4208 of title 18 of the United States Code to provide victims of crime (and their survivors) opportunity to be heard at Federal parole determinations.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to allow victims of crimes or their survivors the opportunity to be heard at Federal parole proceedings of their offenders.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4208 of title 18 of the United States Code to provide victims of crime (and their survivors) opportunity to be heard at Federal parole determinations.
